item.title: Clinical Trials Affected by Research Grant Terminations at the National Institutes of Health
item.description: Feld: Clinical Medicine Kategorie: Medicine, General & Internal Score: 1510 Autoren: Vishal R. Patel, Michael Liu, Anupam B. Jena Journal: JAMA Internal Medicine Veröffentlicht: 2026-01-01 Abstract: This cross-sectional study summarizes the number of trials with terminated grants from the National Institutes of Health (NIH) and calculates the proportion of affected trials among those with previously active NIH funding, by trial status at time of grant termination and by trial characteristics. DOI: 10.1001/jamainternmed.2025.6088 ISSN: 2168-6106 Tag der Erhebung (OOIR): 2026-01-15
